Items.content: Hello! I'm a full-stack developer who embarked on the exciting journey of programming in 2022. I've gained diverse experiences, including participating in courses at wbscoding in Berlin and working as a general programmer at the Technical and Vocational Organization of Iran.
Items.contentSecond: Furthermore, on the path of advanced learning, I attended the Faravine Bootcamp in Mashhad, Iran, and took part in various offline courses, such as specialized training in React and SQL Server at Maktabkhane Tehran.
Items.contentThird: My boundless passion for coding and a perpetual eagerness to learn drive me to continually enhance my skills. Currently navigating through a path filled with challenges and exciting projects, I aspire to be a pioneering and creative programmer in the dynamic world of technology. I am thrilled to share my experiences with the vibrant community of developers and enthusiasts
